title: Stake all ETH and 20000 $MTRS1 into a LP.
body:
We are growing as an organization and we need a way to let members join our DAO in a completely automated way. The easiest way to do this would be to create a liquidity pool on an exchange, so prospective members can just buy their membership tokens without anyone from the MTR team having to do anything.

 We have enough ETH in the treasury to open an LP that would allow people to get $MTRS1 tokens on their own.

This would also reduce the burden on the team from people accidentally sending wrong wallet addresses / coinbase owned addresses. 

There are a few options listed below for people to vote on.
author: 0x91b51c173a4bDAa1A60e234fC3f705A16D228740
